ygData.subject: RE: Here's a rumor for ya... Everquest movie !?!
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool, Aranlas=) I didnt know you were on this list? -Martyn used to be on MM list ... From: Kirk Baptista [mailto:dopey@magiclink.net] Sent: Thursday, January
ygData.messageBody:
Cool, Aranlas=)
I didnt know you were on this list?

-Martyn used to be on MM list

-----Original Message-----
From: Kirk Baptista [mailto:dopey@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 13, 2000 1:33 AM
To: ''eqmithanielmarr@onelist.com' '; 'eqbards@onelist.com '
Subject: [eqbards] Here's a rumor for ya... Everquest movie !?!


From: Kirk Baptista <dopey@...>

Well, I couldn't believe it!

Ain't It Cool News, a very cool and popular movie industry rumor mill, is
reporting the possibility of an Everquest movie:

"EVERQUEST.... based on that big fantasy game of Sony's.... The film will be
done by the same folks (Square's Digimation) that are bringing us FINAL
FANTASY. It will be one gigantic, photorealistic fantasy film. And SUPERMEGA
is currently in negotiations with Columbia to take the project. This will be
beautiful."

Wow. I want to play the charmingly witty Bard...

http://aint-it-cool-news.com/display.cgi?id=4991

(It's way down towards the bottom)

Aranlas Starchaser
Starstruck Bard of Kelethin
